title: Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins Christmas Cloth Napkins 17 x 17" Reusable Christmas Religious Napkins Holiday Cloth Napkins O Holy Night Napkins for Christmas Party Nativity Scene(Blue)
descriptions:
Introducing the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins! These beautifully embroidered napkins are the perfect addition to your Christmas celebrations. 

Featuring a Christmas Nativity scene design, these napkins are made of high-quality polyester material, giving them a smooth and glossy finish. The blue color with gold embroidered texts adds a touch of elegance to any table setting.

Measuring 17 x 17 inches (43 x 43 cm), these napkins are the ideal size for your Christmas gatherings, meals, and other religious or festive occasions. The set includes 12 napkins, each embroidered with meaningful Jesus themed text designs such as 'Joy', 'Love', 'Blessed', 'Merry', 'Believe', and 'Peace'.

Not only are these napkins beautiful, but they are also practical. They are washable and reusable, making them a sustainable choice for your table decor. 

These napkins also make a thoughtful gift for your family, friends, or fellow believers. 

Please note that there may be slight errors in size due to manual measurement, and a slight difference in color may occur due to screen display variations. Rest assured, the words on these napkins are not used as a trademark, but only for expression.

Upgrade your Christmas table decor with the Suclain Set of 12 Christmas Nativity Napkins. Order now and add a touch of elegance and religious significance to your celebrations!
